name: SpikeBot
0:
”Alexa, Turn on Conference”
”Alexa, Turn off Maindoor”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
SpikeBot is IoT based Home/Office Automation and security System.
Control your home/office using various automation tools from scheduling and Auto On/Off devices. Integrate various electrical systems appliances from single APP which can be controlled from anywhere.

You can start with "Alexa, Turn off lobby or Turn on bedroom. These names('lobby', 'Bedroom') are user specified mood in their application. Contact at info@sndkcorp.com to purchase Smart Home products or visit https://spikebot.io

Note : 
This skill requires you to login with your SpikeBot credentials and link the user, so that user can control their devices using this skill. The login credentials will be used for the sole purpose of linking your account. This skill requires a SpikeBot hardware devices.
